code: import React from'react';import styles from'./OptionsGrid.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OptionsGrid=_ref=>{let{options,onOptionClick,correctAnswer,selectedAnswer,mode}=_ref;if(mode==="capital"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.optionsGrid,children:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.map((option,index)=>{let className=styles.optionButton;if(selectedAnswer){if(option===correctAnswer)className+=" ".concat(styles.correct);else if(option===selectedAnswer)className+=" ".concat(styles.wrong);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"option-".concat(index),className:className,onClick:()=>onOptionClick(option),disabled:!!selectedAnswer,children:option},index);})});}else if(mode==="flag"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.optionsGrid,children:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.map((option,index)=>{let className=styles.optionButton;if(selectedAnswer){if(option===correctAnswer)className+=" ".concat(styles.correct);else if(option===selectedAnswer)className+=" ".concat(styles.wrong);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"option-".concat(index),className:className,onClick:()=>onOptionClick(option),disabled:!!selectedAnswer,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:option,alt:"Flag option ".concat(index+1),className:styles.flagOptionImage})},index);})});}};export default OptionsGrid;
